#summary This explains how to build the JavaIDEdroid APK

  # Adjust ndk-build-aaptcomplete.sh to call the ndk-build script of the Android NDK
  # Execute ndk-build-aaptcomplete.sh<br>This step creates the shared library libaaptcomplete.so in libs/armeabi
  # Adjust 0_build-debug.bat and 0_build-prod.bat to match your environment.<br>Adjust following variables: JSDK, ASDK, KS, KEY
  # Execute 0_build-debug.bat or 0_build-prod.bat and choose "do it all"<br>This creates JavaIDEdroid.apk in out/test/JavaIDEdroid/ or out/production/JavaIDEdroid/
